findings.message:
Contract locking ether found:
	Contract HoldefiSettings (HoldefiSettings.sol#375-876) has payable functions:
	 - HoldefiSettings.receive() (HoldefiSettings.sol#492-494)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
findings.name: locked-ether

findings.message:
Reentrancy in HoldefiSettings.addMarket(address,uint256,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#661-680):
	External calls:
	- setBorrowRateInternal(market,borrowRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#676)
		- holdefiContract.beforeChangeBorrowRate(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#768)
	- setSuppliersShareRateInternal(market,suppliersShareRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#677)
		- holdefiContract.beforeChangeSupplyRate(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#797)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- setSuppliersShareRateInternal(market,suppliersShareRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#677)
		- marketAssets[market].suppliersShareRate = newSuppliersShareRate (HoldefiSettings.sol#806)
		- marketAssets[market].suppliersShareRateUpdateTime = currentTime (HoldefiSettings.sol#807)
	HoldefiSettings.marketAssets (HoldefiSettings.sol#437) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- HoldefiSettings.activateMarketInternal(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#743-746)
	- HoldefiSettings.addMarket(address,uint256,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#661-680)
	- HoldefiSettings.deactivateMarket(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#506-509)
	- HoldefiSettings.getInterests(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#549-568)
	- HoldefiSettings.marketAssets (HoldefiSettings.sol#437)
	- HoldefiSettings.marketIsExist(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#478-481)
	- HoldefiSettings.removeMarket(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#685-709)
	- HoldefiSettings.resetPromotionRate(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#588-593)
	- HoldefiSettings.setBorrowRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#755-775)
	- HoldefiSettings.setPromotionRate(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#575-583)
	- HoldefiSettings.setSuppliersShareRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#778-808)
	- activateMarketInternal(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#679)
		- marketAssets[market].isActive = true (HoldefiSettings.sol#744)
	HoldefiSettings.marketAssets (HoldefiSettings.sol#437) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- HoldefiSettings.activateMarketInternal(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#743-746)
	- HoldefiSettings.addMarket(address,uint256,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#661-680)
	- HoldefiSettings.deactivateMarket(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#506-509)
	- HoldefiSettings.getInterests(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#549-568)
	- HoldefiSettings.marketAssets (HoldefiSettings.sol#437)
	- HoldefiSettings.marketIsExist(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#478-481)
	- HoldefiSettings.removeMarket(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#685-709)
	- HoldefiSettings.resetPromotionRate(address) (HoldefiSettings.sol#588-593)
	- HoldefiSettings.setBorrowRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#755-775)
	- HoldefiSettings.setPromotionRate(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#575-583)
	- HoldefiSettings.setSuppliersShareRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#778-808)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in HoldefiSettings.setBorrowRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#755-775):
	External calls:
	- holdefiContract.beforeChangeBorrowRate(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#768)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- BorrowRateChanged(market,newBorrowRate,marketAssets[market].borrowRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#771)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in HoldefiSettings.addMarket(address,uint256,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#661-680):
	External calls:
	- setBorrowRateInternal(market,borrowRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#676)
		- holdefiContract.beforeChangeBorrowRate(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#768)
	- setSuppliersShareRateInternal(market,suppliersShareRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#677)
		- holdefiContract.beforeChangeSupplyRate(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#797)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- MarketActivationChanged(market,true) (HoldefiSettings.sol#745)
		- activateMarketInternal(market) (HoldefiSettings.sol#679)
	- SuppliersShareRateChanged(market,newSuppliersShareRate,marketAssets[market].suppliersShareRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#800-804)
		- setSuppliersShareRateInternal(market,suppliersShareRate) (HoldefiSettings.sol#677)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
HoldefiSettings.setBorrowRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#755-775) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(deltaTime >= periodBetweenUpdates,Increasing rate is not allowed at this time) (HoldefiSettings.sol#762)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
HoldefiSettings.setValueToLoanRateInternal(address,uint256) (HoldefiSettings.sol#811-838) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(deltaTime >= periodBetweenUpdates,Increasing rate is not allowed at this time) (HoldefiSettings.sol#824)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:

findings.name: timestamp
